entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a student who helps Hermione climb up onto the mantelpiece. He is mentioned as having a conversation with Harry and Aberforth.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who is helped by Neville to climb up onto the mantelpiece.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student who follows Hermione and Neville into the tunnel.

entities.name: aberforth
entities.description: Aberforth is a member of the Dumbledore family who helps Harry and his friends. He has a gruff demeanor.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who addresses Aberforth and thanks him for saving their lives twice.

entities.name: ariana
entities.description: Ariana is a member of the Dumbledore family whose portrait is in the room. The passageway behind her portrait is used by Harry and his friends.

entities.name: marauder's map
entities.description: The Marauder's Map is an object that shows the passages in and out of the school.

relationships.description: Aberforth helped Harry and his friends by providing them with a passageway to escape.
Neville assisted Hermione in climbing up onto the mantelpiece.
Harry thanked Aberforth for saving their lives twice.
Aberforth saved Harry and his friends' lives twice.
Neville followed Ron into the tunnel.
